structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 209, sec. 11, effective March 30, 1998. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 138. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4149b-3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Advertisement of sale of tax claims -- Compensation of sheriff.
